title: SCP-5041
content:
[[include info:start]]
**SCP-5041:** The Man in the Iron Mask
**Author:** [[*user stormbreath]]

* Thanks to [[*user MaliceAforethought]] for looking this over. His crit prompted me to go in a vastly different direction from my original drafts, which I was much happier with.
* Thanks to [[*user The Pighead]] for help with French translation.
* Additional thanks to my other critters: [[*user DrAkimoto]], [[*user Oboebandgeek99]], [[*user Anxiety Incorporated]], [[*user MalyceGraves]]

View more of my articles [[[stormbreath|here.]]]

----
